fields.name: AggregatorOrSingleRackDefinition
fields.description: The rack definition that is intended to reflect only a single rack in a single rack cluster, or an aggregator rack in a multi-rack cluster.

fields.name: AnalyticsWorkspaceId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Log Analytics Workspace that will be used for storing relevant logs.

fields.name: AvailableUpgradeVersions
fields.description: The list of cluster runtime version upgrades available for this cluster.

fields.name: ClusterCapacity
fields.description: The capacity supported by this cluster.

fields.name: ClusterConnectionStatus
fields.description: The latest heartbeat status between the cluster manager and the cluster.

fields.name: ClusterExtendedLocation
fields.description: The extended location (custom location) that represents the cluster's control plane location. This extended location is used to route the requests of child objects of the cluster that are handled by the platform operator.

fields.name: ClusterLocation
fields.description: The customer-provided location information to identify where the cluster resides.

fields.name: ClusterManagerConnectionStatus
fields.description: The latest connectivity status between cluster manager and the cluster.

fields.name: ClusterManagerId
fields.description: The resource ID of the cluster manager that manages this cluster. This is set by the Cluster Manager when the cluster is created.

fields.name: ClusterServicePrincipal
fields.description: The service principal to be used by the cluster during Arc Appliance installation.

fields.name: ClusterType
fields.description: The type of rack configuration for the cluster.

fields.name: ClusterVersion
fields.description: The current runtime version of the cluster.

fields.name: ComputeDeploymentThreshold
fields.description: The validation threshold indicating the allowable failures of compute machines during environment validation and deployment.

fields.name: ComputeRackDefinitions
fields.description:
The list of rack definitions for the compute racks in a multi-rack
cluster, or an empty list in a single-rack cluster.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The current detailed status of the cluster.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the detailed status.

fields.name: HybridAksExtendedLocation
fields.description: Field Deprecated. This field will not be populated in an upcoming version. The extended location (custom location) that represents the Hybrid AKS control plane location. This extended location is used when creating provisioned clusters (Hybrid AKS clusters).

fields.name: ManagedResourceGroupConfiguration
fields.description: The configuration of the managed resource group associated with the resource.

fields.name: ManualActionCount
fields.description: The count of Manual Action Taken (MAT) events that have not been validated.

fields.name: NetworkFabricId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Network Fabric associated with the cluster.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the cluster.

fields.name: SupportExpiryDate
fields.description: The support end date of the runtime version of the cluster.

fields.name: WorkloadResourceIds
fields.description: The list of workload resource IDs that are hosted within this cluster.
